   • Academics and researchers: Scholars like Noam Chomsky and Henry

Conclusion

The Bilderberg Group has faced criticism for its lack of transparency,

perceived elitism, and undemocratic nature. The group's influence over global

policies and events has led to concerns about accountability and power
